title: Troy (band)
text:
Troy (Korean: 트로이) is a South Korean hip hop boy band formed by Brand New Music in 2014.  The group consists of 4 members: Bumkey, Jaewoong, Changwoo, and Kanto. Troy debuted on March 14, 2014, with "Green Light".
